page.title: 15RELIGION WEST FLEGG
page.content: Martham Methodist Church was built in 1883.The Reverend Roy Coppack is Minister of Martham and also these surrounding villages:Hemsby,Winterton, Repps,Ludham,Potter Heigham,Horsey, Rollesby,Fleggburgh,Thurne.This is called the Methodist Circuit. In Martham Methodist they have 30_35 congregation.In Rollesby Methodist there is 15_20 congregation and a small Sunday school with about 15 people. The Reverend Dr Kenneth Newton is Vicar of these Churches:Roll esby, clippesby,Oby,Thurne,Billockby,Ashby, Mautby. There are a few Jehovah's Witnesses around here.
